name: Dust Runners
description:
Enjoy racing through our Stylised Canyon on your physics based hover bike! Three unique racers, each with a different style! Can you beat the AI? Download now and experience Dust Running!

Controls Recommended - Controllers -
  • PS4
  • XBOX 360
    • Trigger - Acceleration
    • A/X - Select
    • B/O - Back
    • Start - Pause
    • Left JoyStick - Steering
Also supported - PC -
  • Keyboard
    • WASD - Movement
    • SPACE - Select
    • ESCAPE - Back/Pause
The Team

Click photos for links

Brad - Enviroment artist & sound guy
